Translations.Text: Day ur twalav ara wid idduklen akked ugdud i$ef Izzaaf Oebbi? Ur llin segwen ne$ segsen. Pgalan s tkerkas, u nitni eoan
Ihegga yasen d Oebbi aaaqeb uqsie. Ih, ar dir it wayen xeddmen

Ur sen d ippawi acemma wayla nnsen, ne$ dderya nnsen, mgal Oebbi, d awez$i. Widak d at tmes. Degs, nitni, ad wekkoen
Ass ideg ara ten id Issker Oebbi, meooa, ad aS gallen akken i wen pgallan. Ad $ilen ar ad yili wacu ideg ara iifen. Aani macci, war ccekk, nitni d ikeddaben

Iura Oebbi: war ccekk, d Nek akked imazanen iW, ara irebeen. Oebbi, s tidep, d Uohid, d Uzmir

Ur teppafev ara agdud iumnen s Oebbi akked wass aneggaru, ad iddukwel akked wid ipqamaoen Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Xas ma llan d ibabaten nnsen, ne$ d arraw nnsen, d atmaten nnsen, d alag nnsen. Widak, Iura yasen liman deg ulawen nnsen, Iul iten s ooue s$uoeS. A ten Issekcem di leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkoen. Ouvan Oebbi, Iouva ten. Widak d akabar n Oebbi. Day akabar n Oebbi macci d win ara irebeen
